cards.name: Magnetic Blast
cards.description: Shoot an explosive piercing projectile and disable special effects of all spawns until this attack ends. All other non-barrier entities that come in contact with its effect area will be attached to it. Explodes after touching a wall/barrier, allowing you to attack with all attached entities that survived the explosion.

cards.name: 360 No-Scope
cards.description: Shoot a projectile.

cards.name: Star Storm
cards.description: Deal soft damage to all players, including yourself.

cards.name: Draconic Wings
cards.description: Fly to the target and slash it. Gain an extra action. Ignore all external damage until the end of your turn.

cards.name: Pyromaster
cards.description: Summon 4 mines. Use a basic attack after cast.

cards.name: Arise
cards.description: Sacrifice 1 HP and bring back 1 player from the dead with 1 HP.

cards.name: Aura Pulse
cards.description: Damage everything around you. If you have damaged at least 2 entities, recover 1 HP and 2 mana.

cards.name: Snipe
cards.description: Shoot a projectile. This damage can not be blocked.

cards.name: Minedrop
cards.description: Summon 1 mine. Use a different ability/basic attack after cast.

cards.name: Slingshot Strike
cards.description: Drag your marble back from your intended attack direction (Range: 2) and then attack.

cards.name: Thunder Strike
cards.description: Fly to the target and drop your marble on it.

cards.name: Gust
cards.description: Move all entities away from your marble, but no further than max range from the epicenter (can collide entities into each other). Can be used instead of escape.

cards.name: Entomb
cards.description: Entomb the target in a special barrier. Moving in the barrier or hitting it will destroy it and deal damage to the moving target and whatever is inside. Does not trigger if the entombed entity uses teleport or flying actions.

cards.name: Bouncing Doom
cards.description: Shoot a spreading projectile. If it hits an entity, it damages it and jumps to another target if in range (can’t hit same targets twice).

cards.name: Heal
cards.description: Restore 1 HP to an entity. Escape after cast.

cards.name: Shroom
cards.description: Summon an immune sticky node. Use a basic attack after cast.

cards.name: Explosive Shot
cards.description: An attack that deals splash damage every time it hits a wall or an entity. Deals no contact damage.

cards.name: Meteor Strike
cards.description: Fly your marble up in the air above your position and toss it at your target, creating an explosion at the first ground contact. Impact damage is doubled.
cards.upgradeText: Ignore all damage while using this ability

cards.name: Bomb Toss
cards.description: Shoot an explosive projectile. Gain an extra action.

cards.name: Thunder Blast
cards.description: Fly to the target and drop your marble on it.

cards.name: Leeching Strike
cards.description: Attack a target. If you damage it, recover 1 HP to yourself.

cards.name: Blind Shot
cards.description: Attack an enemy with your eyes closed. Can escape after cast.

cards.name: Barrier
cards.description: Summon a barrier and use a basic attack. Consecutive uses will move the barrier (if in range) and give you an extra action.

cards.name: Mine Launcher
cards.description: Pull up to 2 mines to your position and attack with them. If there are less than 2 mines nearby, you can summon mines for the attack at your position until you have 2 mines. Spend 1 mana for each mine summoned. Can escape after cast.

cards.name: Blaze Wheel
cards.description: An attack that deals splash damage around its trail. Take 1 damage if you land a physical hit on a spawn or a player while performing this attack. The hit entity takes 1 additional damage.

cards.name: Tornado
cards.description: Spin your marble at the target. This attack will damage entities until your marble stops.

cards.name: Possession
cards.description: Attack with another entity. This attack has the damage and effect of the entity. If the entity has no contact damage, the attack won't deal damage.

cards.name: Teleport
cards.description: Switch places with another player. Use a basic attack or ability after cast.

cards.name: Harvest
cards.description: You are immune to all damage this turn, but your attacks can’t damage players. Attack a spawn (can verge). If you hit, repeat this action (until you miss or reach max mana). Recover 1 mana for each destroyed spawn.

cards.name: Convert
cards.description: Sacrifice 1 HP and restore 3 mana to yourself. Can escape after cast.

cards.name: Blink
cards.description: Teleport forward. Use an ability/basic attack after cast.

cards.name: Wing Attack
cards.description: Fly to the target and slash.

cards.name: Multistrike
cards.description: Attack (can verge). If you hit a player/spawn, return to your previous position and repeat the process (until you miss).

cards.name: Clone Strike
cards.description: Summon 2 clones with 1 HP and attack with them and your marble. Your real marble attack can verge. Clones vanish at the end of your turn.

cards.name: Death Ray
cards.description: Shoot a penetrating projectile (can damage multiple entities but can’t penetrate walls).

cards.name: Sky Blast
cards.description: On first turn, your marble flies up into the sky where it can’t be hit by attacks. On next turn, drop on the target, only dealing spash damage. Take 1 damage if you miss. Uses 2 turns in total.

cards.name: Star Beam
cards.description: Shoot a non-damaging projectile that spreads from entity to entity. When the projectile draws a closed loop, it detonates, damaging all players inside of the drawn polygon. Can't damage players that it spread from.

cards.name: Ricoshette
cards.description: A hopping projectile that resets its range after hitting any wall/barrier. Can hit multiple walls/barriers but can’t penetrate them. Must bounce at least once in order to deal damage.

cards.name: Scorch
cards.description: Slash a target, empty all their mana, and blind them until your next turn.

cards.name: Quickshot
cards.description: Attack and return to your starting position after your marble stops (can verge). You are immune to damage while using this ability.

cards.name: Mana Storm
cards.description: Give all spawns living and mana attributes and become the owner of these spawns. Give yourself an extra action.

cards.name: Tectonic Wall
cards.description: Create a barrier from one wall to another and summon 2 nodes on each side of the barrier. The barrier destroys only when both nodes get knocked out. Must be used close to a wall.

cards.name: Quadraphase
cards.description: Mult-step attack. 1: Attack (can verge). 2: Teleport to a R2 location after you stop. 3: Launch a R2 projectile. 4: Teleport yourself or the first damaged target to your starting location.

cards.name: Mana Transfer
cards.description: Transfer up to your entire mana pool to another player. Use a basic attack after cast.

cards.name: Geomancer
cards.description: Summon 4 mines around your marble. Next turn, attack with all 4 mines and escape with your marble. This entire ability cancels if you take damage.

cards.name: Hurricane
cards.description: Spin your marble and collect all entities around it. After 10 seconds, drop all collected entities around your marble, damaging them. Damaged players empty all their mana.

cards.name: Heartbreaker
cards.description: Attack a player 3 times without changing your position or dealing damage. If you hit 3 times, damage the target, reduce their max mana by 1, and spawn three hp nodes around them.

cards.name: Time Leap
cards.description: Summon a point near your position and gain 1 mana. Consecutive uses will teleport you to the point. Gain an extra action after cast.

cards.name: Master Strike
cards.description: An attack that deals 1 additional damage for each time your marble bounces off a wall or a barrier.

cards.name: Flamethrower
cards.description: Damage everything in a 90º cone-shaped area originated from your marble. Area spread can't penetrate walls. Damaged players don't gain any mana and empty 1 mana.

cards.name: Banana Time
cards.description: Summon 2 HP nodes (min distance between nodes: 1). Escape after cast.

cards.name: Toxin Cloud
cards.description: Create an explosion (deals no damage). All affected players will take 1 more damage from the next damage source. All affected special mines and nodes are converted into regular mines.

cards.name: Slam
cards.description: Fly your marble up in the air above your position and toss it at your target. Can only damage players that are in range.

cards.name: Shockwave
cards.description: Shoot a wide projectile. Attack with all affected entities. These attacks have a 90° angle limit. Entities to the left of the projectile can attack in a left-forward facing cone. Opposite cone for right entities.

cards.name: Poison Sting
cards.description: Attack a target. The target will take 1 extra soft damage on your next turn. Players that die from this ability won't trigger their on-death effects.

cards.name: Berserk Strike
cards.description: Attack an enemy. If you miss, take 1 damage.

cards.name: Polar Shift
cards.description: All entities are moved to the closest wall or barrier. Use a basic attack after cast.

cards.name: Portal
cards.description: Summon an immune node and give yourself an extra action. When a second node is summoned, they get linked. Hiting the effect area of one teleport you to the other one, from which you can reset your attack range (max 1 tp per turn, also works for your projectiles). Only players with this card can use the portals.

cards.name: Death's Touch
cards.description: Attack a player. If you damage them, activate all their on-death effects.

cards.name: Fairy Sawblade
cards.description: Shoot a projectile that damages everything else in a wide line. If a player dies from this ability, it gains +1 damage.

cards.name: Dark Wind
cards.description: Blind all other players and double the damage that they receive until your next turn. Can escape after cast.

cards.name: Rearrange
cards.description: Move all non-player entities that belong to you. Can escape after cast.

cards.name: Aura Discharge
cards.description: Charge up for 1 turn. On your next turn, damage all players around your marble. You can’t take damage while charging this ability. Can be used instead of escape. Use a basic attack after finishing this ability.

cards.name: Enrich
cards.description: Enrich ALL non-player entities in an area (mines, barriers, etc.), giving them +1 contact damage. Use a basic attack after cast.

cards.name: Bounce Wall
cards.description: Summon a special barrier and escape. When hit by a projectile, the barrier resets the projectile's range, allowing the caster to shoot it again from the impact spot (can not penetrate the barrier). Consecutive uses will move the barrier (if in range) and give you an extra action.

cards.name: Warp Mine
cards.description: Summon a special mine and give yourself an extra action. Consecutive uses will switch your position with the mine, as well as other entities around you, after which you gain an extra action.

cards.name: Mana Blast
cards.description: Use up to 6 mana and damage everything in a 90° cone (area spread can't penetrate walls). Give this ability +1 damage OR +1 range level for each mana that you spend. Will always use as much mana as possible.

cards.name: Bullet Prism
cards.description: Summon an immune node and use a basic attack. The node creates a copy of any allied projectile that hits it and resets the range of both. These projectiles can't have the same entity as their next target. Area effects of these projectiles can't affect same target twice. These projectiles hit their final target(s) simultaneously.

cards.name: Polaroid Echo
cards.description: Use the effect of your last used item. This does not count as item use. Costs 1 more for each copied items' slot cost. Give yourself an extra action if the item is 'Free Use' or 'Use at Start'.

cards.name: Death Angel's Touch
cards.description: Attack. Take 1 damage and end your turn if you hit a spawn.

cards.name: Rasengan
cards.description: Summon an immune marble and attack with it. Can hit multiple targets. When attack ends, the marble remains on the field with same contact damage. If you hit the marble with a physical attack, ignore its contact damage and attack with it.

cards.name: Distraction Jutsu
cards.description: Summon 6 clones with 1 HP and attack with them. These clones can't deal damage. Clones vanish at the end of your turn. Get an extra action after cast.

cards.name: Shadow Clone
cards.description: Summon a clone of your marble and gain an extra action. You can attack with this clone up to 3 times this turn (these don't count as actions). The clone vanishes at the end of your turn.

cards.name: Berserker
cards.description: Your abilities cost 4 less mana (min 0), but you gain -1 max mana after using an ability . When you reach 0 max mana, discard this card.

cards.name: Blademaster
cards.description: After landing 3 basic attacks on players, gain a shield that will block first external damage that you take (does not charge while you have the shield).

cards.name: Glory
cards.description: Recover 4 mana when a player dies.

cards.name: Dominance
cards.description: Recover 2 hp when a player dies.

cards.name: Grove Heart
cards.description: On death, transfer your remaining mana to another player and heal 2 HP to them.
cards.upgradeText: Takes 1 slot less, heal 3 HP on death

cards.name: Explosive Shards
cards.description: Summon 8 mines on death.

cards.name: Pacifist
cards.description: Your basic attacks and abilities can’t damage allied players.

cards.name: Lucky Coin
cards.description: You can verge twice.

cards.name: Void Protection
cards.description: Gain 3 void shields, each expire after taking void damage. Regain all void shields when a player dies. You can't take lethal void damage.

cards.name: Explosive End
cards.description: Explode on death at your position, dealing 1 damage. Adittional stacks increase S.Range by 1 level but don’t affect damage.

cards.name: Rainbow Gem
cards.description: Increases your max HP by 1 and max mana by 1.

cards.name: Mana Gem
cards.description: Increases your max mana by 2.

cards.name: Spellproof
cards.description: You can’t take lethal damage from enemy abilities. Can’t be combined with Durable and Spiked.

cards.name: Scrap Shells
cards.description: Summon a living mine when your marble stops after taking damage. These newly spawned living mines can't move on your next turn.

cards.name: Escape Master
cards.description: On escape actions, teleport to a free location instead of moving regularly.

cards.name: Death's Decay
cards.description: Your on-death effects trigger twice. Discard this card after activating your on-death effects.

cards.name: Azure Cult
cards.description: Restore 1 mana to yourself after landing a basic attack on a player, but your basic attacks don't deal damage.

cards.name: Crimson Cult
cards.description: Recover 1 HP to yourself after landing a basic attack on a player, but your basic attacks don't deal damage.

cards.name: Mana Cell
cards.description: Increases max mana by 4.

cards.name: Life Cell
cards.description: Increases max HP by 2.

cards.name: Loaded Up
cards.description: Start the game with 3 charged mana.

cards.name: Magic Shield
cards.description: Ignore first external damage that you take.

cards.name: Challenger
cards.description: Taking damage won't trigger an escape turn. You'll still gain mana after taking damage during opponent turns.

cards.name: Life Gem
cards.description: Increases your max HP by 1.

cards.name: Final Accordio
cards.description: After your marble is destroyed, shoot a penetrating projectile in a straight line that can damage multiple entities (can’t penetrate walls).

cards.name: Elemental Resistance
cards.description: When taking damage from void or spawns, ignore the damage and empty one mana for each unit of damage. This also applies to damage originated from spawns (explosions, zaps etc). If you don’t have enough mana, the damage targets your HP.

cards.name: Shadow Cult
cards.description: When a player takes void damage, summon 3 mines.

cards.name: Reinforced Shells
cards.description: Your mines can only take damage from physical attacks.

cards.name: Multispecialist
cards.description: All your abilities take no more than 1 slot and are upgraded, but you can only use each one once (max 10 abilities in deck). Start the game with 3 loaded mana.

cards.name: Durable
cards.description: Your marble can’t take lethal damage from basic attacks. Can’t stack with Spellproof.

cards.name: Eagle Eye
cards.description: Your basic attacks can verge on players.

cards.name: Spiked
cards.description: When a player hits you with a basic attack, deal 1 soft damage to them. Can’t stack with Spellproof.

cards.name: Phoenix Feather
cards.description: After your marble is destroyed, trigger all on-death effects, respawn anywhere with 1 hp and discard this card (turn skip still counts if the next turn is yours). Stacking increases respawn count.

cards.name: Protection Seal
cards.description: Recover 2 HP and discard this card when you reach full mana.

cards.name: Grand Exit
cards.description: On death, shoot piercing projectiles from all spawns towards your marble that damage everything except for you. This death effect will always trigger first.

cards.name: Scorching Aura
cards.description: Players near your marble are unable to use abilities.

cards.name: Morphosis
cards.description: You can skip a turn without acting or moving (will still give you mana). The following turns that you skip without being moved, damaged, or performing any other actions will regenerate 1 HP to you.

cards.name: Purification Cult
cards.description: Whenever a player is healed, you can destroy up to 4 spawns.

cards.name: Ichor
cards.description: After damaging a player with a basic attack, the next non-player damage that they take will be doubled. Debuff clears after triggering.

cards.name: Soul Imbune
cards.description: Decreases your max HP by 1, but increases your max mana by 2. Can't stack with Force Imbune.

cards.name: Force Imbune
cards.description: Decreases your max mana by 3, but increases your max HP by 1. Can't stack with Soul Imbune.

cards.name: Void Heart
cards.description: Damage from your spawns is converted into void damage (their damage no longer counts as non-player entity damage).

cards.name: Second Breath
cards.description: All your physical abilities can verge (once for each shot).

cards.name: Scavenger
cards.description: When a player dies, you get copies of their unused items and bring back 3 of your used items (can overfill your item slots).

cards.name: Ethereal Guard
cards.description: This card gains 1 charge whenever a player takes void damage. On 3 charges, discharges and gains a shield that blocks first external damage (this shield can't stack).

cards.name: Call for The Stars
cards.description: Add 1 charge to this card whenever you summon a mine. On 9 charges, discharge and draw lines between all mines until they form a polygon. All players inside the polygon will take 1 soft void damage.

cards.name: Star in a Jar
cards.description: Your marble can't be affected by status effects (blind, stun, ichor etc.), unless you use an ability/item that places a status effect on you during your turn.

cards.name: Cursed Soul
cards.description: When your marble lands a basic attack, blind the target for 1 of their turns.

cards.name: Cursed Body
cards.description: When your marble is hit by a basic attack, blind the attacker for 1 of their turns.

cards.name: Whisp Minion
cards.description: This card gains 1 charge whenever an item is used. On 1 charge, discharge and gain back one of your used 1-slot items. The amount of required charges increases with each living player.

cards.name: Sturdy
cards.description: You can’t take lethal damage from non-player entities.

cards.name: Crimson Pendant
cards.description: When a player is healed, gain back one of your used 1-slot items.

cards.name: Horcrux
cards.description: Summon a node at the start of the game (at any location). Damaging the node will deal the same damage to you and make both of you escape. While the node is on the field, your marble body ignores ALL other damage. Escape actions also move the node. This node can’t receive any effects and can't be converted into other entities.

cards.name: Exotic Backpack
cards.description: Decreaces your max HP and mana by 1, but gives you 4 additional item slots.

cards.name: Backpack
cards.description: Increases your max number of item slots by 2.

cards.name: Valley of Monuments
cards.description: Mines that you summon are immune.

cards.name: Blood Pact
cards.description: Doubles your max HP but you take double damage from other player attacks (does not affect damage from non-player entities and void damage).

cards.name: Mana Capacitor
cards.description: This card gains 1 charge whenever you cast an ability that spends at least 1 mana. On 3 charges, discharge and recover 1 mana.

cards.name: Infinite Prosperity
cards.description: This card gains 1 charge whenever you summon a spawn. On 4 charges, discharge and recover 1 mana.

cards.name: Infinite Growth
cards.description: This card gains 1 charge whenever you summon a spawn. On 8 charges, discharge and gain +1 max HP.

cards.name: Astral Body
cards.description: Damage from enemy abilities will empty your mana equal to damage dealt instead of targeting your HP. If you don't have enough mana, the damage targets your HP. You don't gain mana when taking damage from basic attacks. Can't stack with Durable.

cards.name: Mana Blood
cards.description: Your missing HP acts as additional mana storage. When healing HP units that are occupied by mana, empty that mana and summon 2 living mines per emptied mana.

cards.name: Sniper Scope
cards.description: Extends the range of your projectile attacks by Range 1.

cards.name: World Splitter
cards.description: When moving using flying actions, draw a line from your take-off position to your landing. Non-flying entities that cross these lines take 1 void damage (new lines activate at the end of your turn). Destroy all your lines when you are healed.

cards.name: Smartphone Grimoire
cards.description: Gives you 15 additional item slots, but your abilities are discarded after use. Not stackable with Multispecialist.

cards.name: Necromancer
cards.description: Your physical attack impacts turn spawns into living mines that you control. These turned spawns keep all their previous effects. Your physical attacks don't deal damage to spawns.

cards.name: Gambit Seeker
cards.description: Gives you 2 additional passive slots, but you start the game at 1 HP.

cards.name: Mana Barrier
cards.description: Instead of taking HP damage, reduce your max mana by the damage amount. Your abilities cost HP when you reach 0 max mana. Reduces your ability slots by 2.

cards.name: Typewriter at the End of Time
cards.description: When a player uses an ability or item card, save the first and last letter of its name to this card. You can use these letters to try to spell a card name during your turns (can repeat same unlocked letters). When you have enough letters unlocked to spell a name of a card (without spaces or special characters), you gain that card for 0 slot cost and with all upgrades. Discard the used letters from this card.

cards.name: Chakra Passthrough
cards.description: You don't gain mana when you take damage. Spawn 3 mana nodes when you would gain mana for taking damage during opponent turns. Must spawn nodes before escaping.

cards.name: Spirit Rush
cards.description: Gain 1 mana when you verge.

cards.name: Shadow Dive
cards.description: You can't take damage from basic attacks that are launched within Range 1 of you.

cards.name: Guardian Mine
cards.description: Summon a special mine at the start of the game. This mine teleports next to you at the end of your every turn.

cards.name: Lasso
cards.description: Drag the target towards your marble.

cards.name: Adrenaline
cards.description: If your basic attack hits this turn (on any entity), repeat it on a different target from hit position. Can't damage same targets twice. Repeat this until you miss or escape.

cards.name: Growth Script
cards.description: Dispense all your mana in form of mines.

cards.name: Nullification Script
cards.description: Deal 1 damage to all non-player entities in range. This damage counts as impact damage.

cards.name: Grappling Hook
cards.description: Move in any direction.

cards.name: Minewarp
cards.description: If you hit a spawn this turn, you can teleport to another spawn and reset your attack range (this effect triggers once). The used spawns will be destroyed. You can verge on spawns and ignore damage from them this turn.

cards.name: Vampire Mine
cards.description: Summon a vampiric mine.

cards.name: Ballistic Net
cards.description: Stuns another player, making them unable to move during their next turn (they can still generate mana).

cards.name: Health Potion
cards.description: Recover 1 HP. Escape after cast.

cards.name: Mana Potion
cards.description: Recover 1 mana. You can’t use abilities this turn.

cards.name: Forest's Heart
cards.description: Regenerate 1 HP to all players in range.

cards.name: Brew of The Dead
cards.description: Sacrifice 1 HP and activate all your on-death effects. Can escape after cast. Can’t be used if you have 1 HP left.

cards.name: Dragon Scale
cards.description: Ignore first external damage instance until end of your turn.

cards.name: Thunder Script
cards.description: A projectile that can bounce from a spawn once, resetting its range.

cards.name: Tesseract Mine
cards.description: Summon a special mine. When a player takes damage, they switch places with this mine at the end of the turn. If there is already an active tesseract mine on field, destroy it.

cards.name: Chaos Script
cards.description: All players empty one mana. Summon a mine near each affected player

cards.name: Dust Wall
cards.description: Summon a fragile barrier. This barrier breaks when damaged.

cards.name: Betrayal
cards.description: Choose to deal 1-5 damage to an allied player. If the ally dies, recover mana negatively proportionate to the damage dealt (5 damage = 1 mana, 3 damage = 3 mana, 1 damage = 5 mana).

cards.name: Shift
cards.description: Switch places with another player.

cards.name: Upgrade Injection
cards.description: Choose: 1: Upgrade all your cards and ignore all downgrades. 2: Deactivate all upgrades of a player and activate all their downgrades. Also choose when the effect ends: when the affected player takes external player damage OR deals damage to another player.

cards.name: Impulse Script
cards.description: Teleport select entities away from your position (can’t teleport into the void).

cards.name: Cursed Touch
cards.description: Damaging a player with contact damage this turn will cause them to discard one of their abilities. Triggers once.

cards.name: Smiting Touch
cards.description: Damaging a player with contact damage this turn will cause them to discard up to 5 items and allow you to take two of them if you have slots available. Triggers once.

cards.name: Freezing Touch
cards.description: Damaging a player with contact damage this turn will make them empty all their current mana in form of mana nodes and unable to gain mana. Effect lasts until they take or deal damage. Triggers once.

cards.name: Decaying Touch
cards.description: Damaging a player with contact damage this turn will cause them to discard one of their passives. Triggers once.

cards.name: Disposition
cards.description: Move a non-player entity. Can move barriers.

cards.name: Detonate
cards.description: Pick a mine. Destroy the mine and deal 1 damage to everything around it.

cards.name: Force Field
cards.description: Summon a special mine (P.Range: 3) that will stop any player that moves into effect range from outside. Will also destroy projectiles that enter it from outside. Does not affect flying entities.

cards.name: Black Hole Propulsion
cards.description: Drop all on-field spawns on your marble. These entities can move your marble. They deal/take no damage until the last one stops. If you hit a player during this action, take 1 damage and cancel your turn.

cards.name: Mimic
cards.description: Use an ability that belongs to another player (upgrades it and copies cost).

cards.name: Duplicate
cards.description: Summon a copy of any non-player entity that is in range (retains entity ownership). Can’t exceed summon limit of that entity.

cards.name: Demonic Script
cards.description: Recover 2 mana. The next non-0-cost ability that you use will cost health instead of mana. You need to have more available health than the ability cost.

cards.name: Healing Block
cards.description: Affected player is not able to recover health. Effect ends once that player deals damage to another player.

cards.name: Potency Spike
cards.description: Choose one: 1: double a spawn's contact damage. 2: Increase a spawn's effect area by 1 Range level. This card can't be used on the same spawn twice.

cards.name: Blight
cards.description: Blind a player until the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Pocket Star
cards.description: Remove all temporary negative effects from you (blind, ichor, venom etc.). Ignore void damage until the end of your turn.

cards.name: Pocket Clover
cards.description: If you missed an attack this turn, redo it once. Effect wears out after triggering.

cards.name: Pocket Mines
cards.description: Summon 2 mines.

cards.name: Impulse Jelly
cards.description: Summon a special node (P.Range: 3). At the start of your next turn, all players are teleported towards that node. Destroy the node afterwards.

cards.name: Mana Injection
cards.description: Instantly recover 1 mana.

cards.name: Wyvern Carapace
cards.description: Ignore the first external damage instance until the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Neurotoxin
cards.description: Your attack damage this turn will prevent damaged targets from moving until the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Living Mine
cards.description: Summon a living mine.

cards.name: Tesla Mine
cards.description: Summon a special mine (P.Range: 5). This mine deals 1 damage to the nearest entity with HP at the start of your every turn.

cards.name: Rewind Cassette
cards.description: Mark your current position. At the end of your turn, return your marble to the marked position and optionally escape.

cards.name: UPGRADE Ability
cards.description: Upgrades 3 upgradable abilities.

cards.name: UPGRADE Passive
cards.description: Upgrades 3 upgradable passives.

cards.name: Tinkerer
cards.description: Your upgrade card can upgrade twice as many cards, but reduces your max item slots by 3. You can only equip this card in one deck.

cards.name: Overdrive
cards.description: Gives you 1 extra deck slot, but reduces your max HP by 2.

cards.name: Overgrowth
cards.description: Gives you 1 extra deck slot, but reduces your max mana by 3.
